Pure dephasing can have a negative impact on the magnon
(photon) blockade characteristics and introduce unwanted de-
coherence in the system. Hence, we investigate the influence of
pure dephasing on cavity photon antibunching characteristics.
To model the effects of pure dephasing, an additional Lindblad
